text: taaki tum kaamayaab ho aur jo haq jihaad karane ka hai khuda kee raah mein jihaad karo usee nen tumako baraguzeeda kiya aur umoore deen mein tum par kisee tarah kee sakhtee nahin kee tumhaare baap ibaraaheem ne majahab ko (tumhaara mazahab bana diya usee (khuda) ne tumhaara pahale hee se musalamaan (pharamaabaradaar bande) naam rakha aur kuraan mein bhee (to jihaad karo) taaki rasool tumhaare muqaabale mein gavaah bane aur tum paabandee se naamaz padha karo aur zakaat dete raho aur khuda hee (ke ehakaam) ko mazaboot pakado vahee tumhaara saraparast hai to kya achchha saraparast hai aur kya achchha madadagaar hai
